product_name: Canari Echelon Pro Bike Shorts - Men's- 2012 Special Buy
long_description: The Canari Echelon Pro Bike shorts offer superior comfort and a great fit. Choose these shorts for long rides where comfort is a must. Polyester/spandex blend fabric wicks moisture away from the skin and dries quickly. 8-panel construction for a great fit. Flatlock seams offer flexibility and comfort. Built-in, seamless molded chamois provides padded comfort for long stretches in the saddle. Silicone grippers at cuffs keep Canari bike shorts from riding up; drawcord waistband ensures a perfect fit. Special buy.
short_description: The Canari Echelon Pro Bike shorts offer superior comfort and a great fit. Choose these shorts for long rides where comfort is a must.
